nodes.bodyText: Moving these tho the inner class, removing the interface implemenation and declaring getInstance as returning only TextMapPropagator instead of W3CTraceContextPropagator where the only changes here. Unfortunately it seems GitHub does not show that well.
If you could add some javadoc with a pointer over to what the user should be using, that would be more user-friendly. Also on the getInstance() method, I think.
